thread.title: Bella Thorne Celebrates 18th Birthday With Close Friends in Yacht and Six Flags Theme Park
thread.title_full: Bella Thorne Celebrates 18th Birthday With Close Friends in Yacht and Six Flags Theme Park

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Bella Thorne Celebrates 18th Birthday With Close Friends in Yacht and Six Flags Theme Park
text:
Comments The 'My Own Worst Enemy' actress celebrated her 18th birthday with her close friends in a yacht and Six Flags Magic Mountain theme park in Valencia, California over the weekend. 
Bella Thorne celebrated her 18th birthday with her close friends in a yacht over the weekend. Her lavish birthday party featured a big red birthday cake and tickets to Six Flags Magic Mountain theme park in Valencia, California. The "My Own Worst Enemy" actress took to Instagram on Saturday, October to share some snaps from the party. One of the snaps showed Bella sitting alongside her girl pals at the side of the yacht. She looked stunning in a simple red dress and heels of the same hue. "The ladies of the night," read the caption. She also posted a video of her with a big red birthday cake. Foto kiriman BELLA (@bellathorne) pada Okt 10, 2015 pada 8:05 PDT Video kiriman BELLA (@bellathorne) pada Okt 11, 2015 pada 2:05 PDT Bella also posted a snap with her singer pal Peyton List . Peyton wore a black top and matching trousers. While Bella was smiling to the camera, Peyton pouted her lips while giving a gaze to the birthday girl. A caption for the snap read, "Had this little sexy momma with me !!!@peytonlist." Peyton also posted a snap of them together on her Instagram page. She captioned it, "Happy birthday babeee [18]." Foto kiriman BELLA (@bellathorne) pada Okt 11, 2015 pada 11:35 PDT Foto kiriman peypeylist (@peytonlist) pada Okt 11, 2015 pada 10:14 PDT The blonde beauty then brought her guests to Six Flags Magic Mountain where they had the theme park all to themselves for a night. "Shut down Six Flags last night like @sixflagsmagicmountain @wildfoxcouture," she wrote alongside a snap showing her guests wearing T-shirts and sweatshirts with words, "Happy Birthday B***h." Foto kiriman BELLA (@bellathorne) pada Okt 11, 2015 pada 4:39 PDT Bella also posted a snap of her carrying an adorable gift which was a pink bag. "Thank you for the cute pink bag. It comes in handy and is stylish too! Love it," she wrote alongside the snap. In addition to Peyton, Bella's celebrity guests included Veronica Dunne, Olivia Holt and Halston Sage . Foto kiriman BELLA (@bellathorne) pada Okt 11, 2015 pada 7:08 PDT
